org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface View

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    View

    public interface View
    Author:
    withersp OpenNTF extensions to View class

    • Method Detail

      • getAllDocuments

        DocumentCollection getAllDocuments()
        Gets all documents from the View.

        NOTE: This doesn't take into account any searching done over the view. It also iterates the NoteIDs from the entries in the view and adds those documents to a collection. Although a convenience method, in all likelihood the recommended approach would be to use getAllEntries and then, while iterating the entries, call getDocument().

        One use case for this is if you need to pass a DocumentCollection to a method, e.g. org.openntf.domino.helpers.DocumentSyncHelper.process(DocumentCollection)

        Returns:
        DocumentCollection
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • getNoteCollection

        NoteCollection getNoteCollection()
        Gets all documents from the View as a NoteCollection.

        NOTE: This may not be particularly performant at this time so has been deprecated.

        Returns:
        NoteCollection
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 3.0.0

      • getXPageAlt

        String getXPageAlt()
        Gets the XPage the view is designed to open using, on View Properties Advanced tab (beanie image)
        Returns:
        String XPage name the View will launch with on web
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • isIndexed

        boolean isIndexed()
        Checks whether or not the View has been indexed
        Returns:
        boolean if indexed
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 4.5.0

      • checkUnique

        boolean checkUnique(Object key,
                    Document srcDoc)
        Checks whether the source document is unique within the view
        Parameters:
        srcDoc - Document the developer wants to check is unique
        key - Object to be checked against the sorted View
        Returns:
        whether the document is unique or not
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • getColumnMap

        Map<String,ViewColumn> getColumnMap()
        Gets a map of the ViewColumn objects that comprise this view
        Returns:
        Map of ViewColumn objects
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • getIndexType

        View.IndexType getIndexType()
        Interrogates the flags in the design note to identify the index type for the View
        Returns:
        IndexType for the view, e.g. IndexType.SHARED, IndexType.SHAREDPRIVATEONSERVER
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isTimeSensitive

        boolean isTimeSensitive()
        Interrogates the design note for the $FormulaTV field. This exists if a time-specific formula is included in the view, i.e. "@Today" or "@Now". This severely impacts performance and developers using this should be re-educated on better practice alternatives
        Returns:
        Whether the view includes any time-sensitive formulas
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isDisableAutoUpdate

        boolean isDisableAutoUpdate()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /L flag. This disables auto-update so users will need to manually refresh the view. This can be done via the refresh indicator in Notes Client, but a mechanism needs coding for XPages.
        Returns:
        whether the view has auto update disabled
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isHideEmptyCategories

        boolean isHideEmptyCategories()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /C flag. This exists if "Hide empty categories" is switched on. This prevents categories being displayed if the user does not have access to any of the documents within that category.
        Returns:
        whether empty categories are hidden when accessing via UI
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isDiscardIndex

        boolean isDiscardIndex()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /T flag. This exists if the index should be discarded after each use.
        Returns:
        whether the view index is discarded after each use
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isManualRefresh

        boolean isManualRefresh()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /M flag. This exists if the view has to be manually refreshed. This can be done via the refresh indicator in Notes Client, but a mechanism needs coding for XPages.
        Returns:
        whether manual refresh of the view is required
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isAutomaticRefresh

        boolean isAutomaticRefresh()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /O flag. This exists if the view is set to be automatically refreshed
        Returns:
        whether automatic refresh of the view is in place
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • isAutoRefreshAfterFirstUse

        boolean isAutoRefreshAfterFirstUse()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field to see if the view index is Auto after first use, the default.
        Returns:
        whether auto after first use index is in place
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • getAutoRefreshSeconds

        int getAutoRefreshSeconds()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /R flag and gets the integer after the equals. The existence of the flag identifies the refresh setting as "Auto, at most every". The number is the amount of seconds between automatic refreshes of the view.
        Returns:
        number of seconds between auto-refreshes
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0

      • getDiscardHours

        int getDiscardHours()
        Interrogates the design note's $Index field for the /P flag and gets the integer after the equals. This is the number of hours before a view index is discarded.
        Returns:
        number of hours until the index is discarded
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 5.0.0
